title: Trolls
body: Is there anything we can do about this troll account playing ranked named 'Mi Sum Dum Kun' he afks, feeds, chooses same lane as others and ruins the game for everyone on ranked... this isnt the first person to do this, riot get your stuff together and fix the matchmaking

replies.body: it is reaaally hard to fix matchmaking though
Witch-hunting is forbidden on the boards.

ok how about this there should be a new report category ( Trolls ) so that if you troll in a ranked game you get banned for a week if you continue it goes to a month and if you still troll you get banned for the season...

now yes this is tough but i think that 3 chances is more then enough it would mean that you would lose alot of the trolls as they would all play norm's instead of ranked witch should be for the players that want to better there game..

just saying its not the match macking that needs to be fixed its the trolls that need to be banned and for longer times
